title: Day 17: Jacob Meets Esau (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike dives into the love Jacob has for God, and how this is shown when Jacob meets Esau. Today's readings are Genesis 33-34, Job 23-24, and Proverbs 3:13-18.
description:
Fr. Mike dives into the love Jacob has for God, and how this is shown when Jacob meets Esau. Today's readings are Genesis 33-34, Job 23-24, and Proverbs 3:13-18.
For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.
